long_description: The REI women's Revelcloud vest gives you lightweight warmth during chilly days on the trail. It easily layers under a shell on rainy days and stuffs into its own lumbar pocket to stash in your pack. Revelcloud resists winds up to 50 mph, and has a DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish that fends off light rain showers, snow and stains. Pertex(R) Quantum ECO recycled shell fabric and soft lining create an incredibly lightweight, durable and packable jacket. PrimaLoft(R) ECO synthetic microfiber insulation works a lot like down with low bulk and excellent packability, yet provides warmth even when wet. Side panels made from Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) hardface fleece increase breathability, decrease bulkiness and add a feminine shape; panels are wind resistant to 9 mph. Full-length front zipper with draft flap and chin guard; stretch binding on collar and armholes. The REI women's Revelcloud vest has 2 zip handwarmer pockets; zip chest pocket with media port; adjustable hem.
short_description: The REI women's Revelcloud vest gives you lightweight warmth during chilly days on the trail. It easily layers under a shell on rainy days and stuffs into its own lumbar pocket to stash in your pack.
